member.summary: Performs a comparison of two objects and returns a value indicating whether one is less than, equal to or greater than the other.

member.name: M:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Collections.IPAddressComparer.Compare(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Performs a comparison of two string objects and returns a value indicating whether one is less than, equal to or greater than the other.
member.remarks: The strings should be a valid date time format.

member.name: T:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.ConnectionStatus
member.summary: Represents the network connection connectionStatus.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.ConnectionStatus.Unknown
member.summary: The network connection status is not known.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.ConnectionStatus.Connected
member.summary: The network is connected.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.ConnectionStatus.Disconnected
member.summary: The network is disconnected.

member.name: T:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.Constants
member.summary: An internal class that defines the p/invoke constants required by the Win32 API calls that are used inside the library.

member.name: T:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SERVER_INFO_101
member.summary: The SERVER_INFO_101 structure contains information about the specified server, including name, platform, type of server, and associated software.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SERVER_INFO_101.sv101_platform_id
member.summary: Specifies the information level to use for platform-specific information.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SERVER_INFO_101.sv101_name
member.summary: Pointer to a Unicode string specifying the name of a server.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SERVER_INFO_101.sv101_version_major
member.summary: Specifies, in the least significant 4 bits of the byte, the major release version number of the operating system. The most significant 4 bits of the byte specifies the server type. The mask MAJOR_VERSION_MASK should be used to ensure correct results.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SERVER_INFO_101.sv101_version_minor
member.summary: Specifies the minor release version number of the operating system.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SERVER_INFO_101.sv101_type
member.summary: Specifies the type of software the computer is running.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SERVER_INFO_101.sv101_comment
member.summary: Pointer to a Unicode string specifying a comment describing the server. The comment can be null.

member.name: T:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric
member.summary: Flags used with the GetSystemMetrics function.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXSCREEN
member.summary: Width of the screen of the primary display monitor, in pixels. This is the same values obtained by calling GetDeviceCaps as follows: GetDeviceCaps( hdcPrimaryMonitor, HORZRES).

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYSCREEN
member.summary: Height of the screen of the primary display monitor, in pixels. This is the same values obtained by calling GetDeviceCaps as follows: GetDeviceCaps( hdcPrimaryMonitor, VERTRES).

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYVSCROLL
member.summary: Width of a horizontal scroll bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXVSCROLL
member.summary: Height of a horizontal scroll bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYCAPTION
member.summary: Height of a caption area, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXBORDER
member.summary: Width of a window border, in pixels. This is equivalent to the SM_CXEDGE value for windows with the 3-D look.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYBORDER
member.summary: Height of a window border, in pixels. This is equivalent to the SM_CYEDGE value for windows with the 3-D look.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXDLGFRAME
member.summary: Thickness of the frame around the perimeter of a window that has a caption but is not sizable, in pixels. SM_CXFIXEDFRAME is the height of the horizontal border and SM_CYFIXEDFRAME is the width of the vertical border.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYDLGFRAME
member.summary: Thickness of the frame around the perimeter of a window that has a caption but is not sizable, in pixels. SM_CXFIXEDFRAME is the height of the horizontal border and SM_CYFIXEDFRAME is the width of the vertical border.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYVTHUMB
member.summary: Height of the thumb box in a vertical scroll bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXHTHUMB
member.summary: Width of the thumb box in a horizontal scroll bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXICON
member.summary: Default width of an icon, in pixels. The LoadIcon function can load only icons with the dimensions specified by SM_CXICON and SM_CYICON.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYICON
member.summary: Default height of an icon, in pixels. The LoadIcon function can load only icons with the dimensions SM_CXICON and SM_CYICON.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXCURSOR
member.summary: Width of a cursor, in pixels. The system cannot create cursors of other sizes.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYCURSOR
member.summary: Height of a cursor, in pixels. The system cannot create cursors of other sizes.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYMENU
member.summary: Height of a single-line menu bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXFULLSCREEN
member.summary: Width of the client area for a full-screen window on the primary display monitor, in pixels. To get the coordinates of the portion of the screen not obscured by the system taskbar or by application desktop toolbars, call the SystemParametersInfo function with the SPI_GETWORKAREA value.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYFULLSCREEN
member.summary: Height of the client area for a full-screen window on the primary display monitor, in pixels. To get the coordinates of the portion of the screen not obscured by the system taskbar or by application desktop toolbars, call the SystemParametersInfo function with the SPI_GETWORKAREA value.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYKANJIWINDOW
member.summary: For double byte character set versions of the system, this is the height of the Kanji window at the bottom of the screen, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_MOUSEWHEELPRESENT
member.summary: Nonzero if a mouse with a wheel is installed; zero otherwise.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYHSCROLL
member.summary: Height of the arrow bitmap on a vertical scroll bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXHSCROLL
member.summary: Width of the arrow bitmap on a horizontal scroll bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_DEBUG
member.summary: Nonzero if the debug version of User.exe is installed; zero otherwise.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_SWAPBUTTON
member.summary: Nonzero if the left and right mouse buttons are reversed; zero otherwise.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_RESERVED1
member.summary: Reserved for future use.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_RESERVED2
member.summary: Reserved for future use.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_RESERVED3
member.summary: Reserved for future use.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_RESERVED4
member.summary: Reserved for future use.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXMIN
member.summary: Minimum width of a window, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYMIN
member.summary: Minimum height of a window, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXSIZE
member.summary: Width of a button in a window's caption or title bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYSIZE
member.summary: Height of a button in a window's caption or title bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXFRAME
member.summary: Thickness of the sizing border around the perimeter of a window that can be resized, in pixels. SM_CXSIZEFRAME is the width of the horizontal border, and SM_CYSIZEFRAME is the height of the vertical border.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYFRAME
member.summary: Thickness of the sizing border around the perimeter of a window that can be resized, in pixels. SM_CXSIZEFRAME is the width of the horizontal border, and SM_CYSIZEFRAME is the height of the vertical border.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXMINTRACK
member.summary: Minimum tracking width of a window, in pixels. The user cannot drag the window frame to a size smaller than these dimensions. A window can override this value by processing the WM_GETMINMAXINFO message.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYMINTRACK
member.summary: Minimum tracking height of a window, in pixels. The user cannot drag the window frame to a size smaller than these dimensions. A window can override this value by processing the WM_GETMINMAXINFO message.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXDOUBLECLK
member.summary: Width of the rectangle around the location of a first click in a double-click sequence, in pixels. The second click must occur within the rectangle defined by SM_CXDOUBLECLK and SM_CYDOUBLECLK for the system to consider the two clicks a double-click.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYDOUBLECLK
member.summary: Height of the rectangle around the location of a first click in a double-click sequence, in pixels. The second click must occur within the rectangle defined by SM_CXDOUBLECLK and SM_CYDOUBLECLK for the system to consider the two clicks a double-click. The two clicks must also occur within a specified time.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXICONSPACING
member.summary: Width of a grid cell for items in large icon view, in pixels. Each item fits into a rectangle of size SM_CXICONSPACING by SM_CYICONSPACING when arranged. This value is always greater than or equal to SM_CXICON.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYICONSPACING
member.summary: Height of a grid cell for items in large icon view, in pixels. Each item fits into a rectangle of size SM_CXICONSPACING by SM_CYICONSPACING when arranged. This value is always greater than or equal to SM_CYICON.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_MENUDROPALIGNMENT
member.summary: Nonzero if drop-down menus are right-aligned with the corresponding menu-bar item; zero if the menus are left-aligned.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_PENWINDOWS
member.summary: Nonzero if the Microsoft Windows for Pen computing extensions are installed; zero otherwise.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_DBCSENABLED
member.summary: Nonzero if User32.dll supports DBCS; zero otherwise. (WinMe/95/98): Unicode.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CMOUSEBUTTONS
member.summary: Number of buttons on mouse, or zero if no mouse is installed.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXFIXEDFRAME
member.summary: Identical Values Changed After Windows NT 4.0.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYFIXEDFRAME
member.summary: Identical Values Changed After Windows NT 4.0.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXSIZEFRAME
member.summary: Identical Values Changed After Windows NT 4.0.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYSIZEFRAME
member.summary: Identical Values Changed After Windows NT 4.0.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_SECURE
member.summary: Nonzero if security is present; zero otherwise.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXEDGE
member.summary: Width of a 3-D border, in pixels. This is the 3-D counterpart of SM_CXBORDER.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYEDGE
member.summary: Height of a 3-D border, in pixels. This is the 3-D counterpart of SM_CYBORDER.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXMINSPACING
member.summary: Width of a grid cell for a minimized window, in pixels. Each minimized window fits into a rectangle this size when arranged. This value is always greater than or equal to SM_CXMINIMIZED.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYMINSPACING
member.summary: Height of a grid cell for a minimized window, in pixels. Each minimized window fits into a rectangle this size when arranged. This value is always greater than or equal to SM_CYMINIMIZED.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXSMICON
member.summary: Recommended width of a small icon, in pixels. Small icons typically appear in window captions and in small icon view.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYSMICON
member.summary: Recommended height of a small icon, in pixels. Small icons typically appear in window captions and in small icon view.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYSMCAPTION
member.summary: Height of a small caption, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXSMSIZE
member.summary: Width of small caption buttons, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYSMSIZE
member.summary: Height of small caption buttons, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXMENUSIZE
member.summary: Width of menu bar buttons, such as the child window close button used in the multiple document interface, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYMENUSIZE
member.summary: Height of menu bar buttons, such as the child window close button used in the multiple document interface, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_ARRANGE
member.summary: Flags specifying how the system arranged minimized windows.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXMINIMIZED
member.summary: Width of a minimized window, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYMINIMIZED
member.summary: Height of a minimized window, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXMAXTRACK
member.summary: Default maximum width of a window that has a caption and sizing borders, in pixels. This metric refers to the entire desktop. The user cannot drag the window frame to a size larger than these dimensions. A window can override this value by processing the WM_GETMINMAXINFO message.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYMAXTRACK
member.summary: Default maximum height of a window that has a caption and sizing borders, in pixels. This metric refers to the entire desktop. The user cannot drag the window frame to a size larger than these dimensions. A window can override this value by processing the WM_GETMINMAXINFO message.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXMAXIMIZED
member.summary: Default width, in pixels, of a maximized top-level window on the primary display monitor.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYMAXIMIZED
member.summary: Default height, in pixels, of a maximized top-level window on the primary display monitor.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_NETWORK
member.summary: Least significant bit is set if a network is present; otherwise, it is cleared. The other bits are reserved for future use.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CLEANBOOT
member.summary: Value that specifies how the system was started: 0-normal, 1-failsafe, 2-failsafe /w net.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXDRAG
member.summary: Width of a rectangle centered on a drag point to allow for limited movement of the mouse pointer before a drag operation begins, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYDRAG
member.summary: Height of a rectangle centered on a drag point to allow for limited movement of the mouse pointer before a drag operation begins. This value is in pixels. It allows the user to click and release the mouse button easily without unintentionally starting a drag operation.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_SHOWSOUNDS
member.summary: Nonzero if the user requires an application to present information visually in situations where it would otherwise present the information only in audible form; zero otherwise.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXMENUCHECK
member.summary: Width of the default menu check-mark bitmap, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYMENUCHECK
member.summary: Height of the default menu check-mark bitmap, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_SLOWMACHINE
member.summary: Nonzero if the computer has a low-end (slow) processor; zero otherwise.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_MIDEASTENABLED
member.summary: Nonzero if the system is enabled for Hebrew and Arabic languages, zero if not.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_MOUSEPRESENT
member.summary: Nonzero if a mouse is installed; zero otherwise. This value is rarely zero, because of support for virtual mice and because some systems detect the presence of the port instead of the presence of a mouse.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_XVIRTUALSCREEN
member.summary: Windows 2000 (v5.0+) Coordinate of the top of the virtual screen.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_YVIRTUALSCREEN
member.summary: Windows 2000 (v5.0+) Coordinate of the left of the virtual screen.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXVIRTUALSCREEN
member.summary: Windows 2000 (v5.0+) Width of the virtual screen.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYVIRTUALSCREEN
member.summary: Windows 2000 (v5.0+) Height of the virtual screen.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CMONITORS
member.summary: Number of display monitors on the desktop.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_SAMEDISPLAYFORMAT
member.summary: Windows XP (v5.1+) Nonzero if all the display monitors have the same color format, zero otherwise. Note that two displays can have the same bit depth, but different color formats. For example, the red, green, and blue pixels can be encoded with different numbers of bits, or those bits can be located in different places in a pixel's color value.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_IMMENABLED
member.summary: Windows XP (v5.1+) Nonzero if Input Method Manager/Input Method Editor features are enabled; zero otherwise.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CXFOCUSBORDER
member.summary: Windows XP (v5.1+) Width of the left and right edges of the focus rectangle drawn by DrawFocusRect. This value is in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CYFOCUSBORDER
member.summary: Windows XP (v5.1+) Height of the top and bottom edges of the focus rectangle drawn by DrawFocusRect. This value is in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_TABLETPC
member.summary: Nonzero if the current operating system is the Windows XP Tablet PC edition, zero if not.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_MEDIACENTER
member.summary: Nonzero if the current operating system is the Windows XP, Media Center Edition, zero if not.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CMETRICS_OTHER
member.summary: Metrics Other.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CMETRICS_2000
member.summary: Metrics Windows 2000.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_CMETRICS_NT
member.summary: Metrics Windows NT.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_REMOTESESSION
member.summary: Windows XP (v5.1+) This system metric is used in a Terminal Services environment. If the calling process is associated with a Terminal Services client session, the return value is nonzero. If the calling process is associated with the Terminal Server console session, the return value is zero. The console session is not necessarily the physical console - see WTSGetActiveConsoleSessionId for more information.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_SHUTTINGDOWN
member.summary: Windows XP (v5.1+) Nonzero if the current session is shutting down; zero otherwise.

member.name: F:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Interop.SystemMetric.SM_REMOTECONTROL
member.summary: Windows XP (v5.1+) This system metric is used in a Terminal Services environment. Its value is nonzero if the current session is remotely controlled; zero otherwise.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Resources.Strings.Format_Dns_Bad_Ip_Address
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An invalid IP address was specified..

member.name: P:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Resources.Strings.InvalidOperation_QueryStringParameterDictionaryParsing
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The query string is not in a correct format..

member.name: P:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.Resources.Strings.net_http_chunked_not_allowed_with_content_length

member.name: T:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.ServerInfo
member.summary: The Server structure contains information about the specified server, including name, platform, type of server, and associated software.

member.name: P:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.ServerInfo.PlatformId
member.summary: Gets the information level used for platform-specific information.

member.name: P:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.ServerInfo.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the computer.
member.value: A that represents the name of the computer.

member.name: P:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.ServerInfo.Comment
member.summary: Gets the Server comment.
member.value: A that represents the comment associated with the server or an empty string if there is no comment.

member.name: P:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.ServerInfo.MajorVersion
member.summary: Gets the operating system major version number.
member.value: An value representing the major version number of the operating system.

member.summary: Gets the operating system minor version number.
member.value: An value representing the minor version number of the operating system.

member.name: P:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.ServerInfo.Version
member.summary: Gets the operating system version number.
member.value: A representing the operating system version.

member.name: P:Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.ServerInfo.ServerType
member.summary: Gets the type of software the computer is running.
member.value: A value that represents the operating system running on the computer.

member.name: M:Cadru.Networking.ExtendedNetworkInformation.GetServerList(Cadru.Net.NetworkInformation.ServerTypes,System.String)
member.summary: Gets an array of instances of the specified server type for the given domain.
member.param: A bitwise combination of enumeration values that defines what server types to search.
The name of the domain to search, or to search the primary domain.
member.returns: An array of instances of the specified server type for the given domain.
